page.title: 16PRIMARY SCHOOL CLUBS.
page.content: These{activities}all took place either during the lunch hour period or after school had finished.{Football}was a popular activity for the boys;netball amongst girls.Schools also had foot- ball and{netball}teams in leagues or playing friendly matche.{Rounders}was a popular mixed sport and this was also played on a club and inter-school basis.A recent sport in schools is {gymnastics;}girls take part more than boys. Schools held clubs to cater for {musical}children who often graduated onto{descant,treble and tenor recorder whilst many took up the{clarinet,flute {cornet,guitar and violin.}Schools also had school{choirs}performing at many concerts in and out of school through the year.{Drama}clubs were popular; schools performed productions through the year.{Computer}clubs were popular. Clubs operate on most evenings.
